<title level="1" pfs="">[Gunmarshal](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1939)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Gunmarshal](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1939)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Flintlock Musket](/Weapons.aspx?ID=191) (10 rounds), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flintlock musket +11,
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +11,
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Firearms Critical Specialization**   When the gunmarshal makes a critical hit with a firearm, the target must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or be [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) 1.

**Lawbringer** <actions string="Single Action" />  he gunmarshal marks a foe for judgment, granting the gunmarshal a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed when moving toward that creature.

</column>
name: Gunmarshal

text: Gunmarshal Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Gunmarshal Source Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 57 Perception +10 Languages Common, Kelish Skills Acrobatics +6, Athletics +9, Intimidation +7 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +2 Int +0 Wis +0 Cha +1 Items Flintlock Musket (10 rounds), Leather Armor, Shortsword --- AC 18 Fort +10 Ref +10 Will +4 HP 30 --- Speed 25 feet Ranged Single Action flintlock musket +11, Damage 1d6+4 piercing Melee Single Action shortsword +11, Damage 1d6+4 piercing Firearms Critical Specialization When the gunmarshal makes a critical hit with a firearm, the target must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or be stunned 1. Lawbringer Single Action he gunmarshal marks a foe for judgment, granting the gunmarshal a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed when moving toward that creature.
